alert.note: Alert for Butler; Cowley; Sedgwick; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 2:50AM CDT until June 10 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Cowley County in south central Kansas... Southern Sedgwick County in south central Kansas... Southwestern Butler County in south central Kansas... Sumner County in south central Kansas... * Until 400 AM CDT. * At 250 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles southeast of Cheney to near Rose Hill, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Derby, Arkansas City, Winfield, Haysville, Wellington, Mulvane, Rose Hill, Clearwater, Douglass, Belle Plaine, Conway Springs, Caldwell, Oxford, Udall, Argonia, South Haven, Geuda Springs, Viola, Rock and Mayfield. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 1 and 40. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
